user.title: London Unified Prayer Times
user.description: Welcome to LUPT! Please refer to the documentation to understand the settings below

data.html_table_css_class: CSS class to use. Leave blank unless instructed otherwise
data.zawaal_mins: Positive number of minutes before Zuhr that Zawaal begins
data.islamic_date_at_maghrib: Switch Islamic Date at Maghrib instead of midnight
data.use_asr_mithl_2: Use Mithl 2 for Asr instead of Mithl 1
